Description:
Position Title:             Derma NurseEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 10K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAEAbout the Client:An aesthetic clinic based in Dubai, inspired by Southern American conceptJob Description:Conduct pre-treatment assessments and assist during non-surgical aesthetic procedures
Own department inventory, prepare order list and cost price sheet
Educate patients on procedure details, risks, benefits, and post-care instructions
Monitor post-treatment progress, address patient concerns, and provide guidance
Maintain accurate patient records and other ad hoc tasks as assigned.Skills
Skills:
Open to Filipino nationals
Female, 40 years old and below
Minimum 5 years related experience with DHA license
Experience in doing inventory and cost price sheet of consumables (syringe, gloves, etc.)
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
